title: Guardians' Inferno
text:
{{Adaptation}} {{Marvel Database:Film Template | Image = Guardians' Inferno poster 001.png | Image2 = Guardians' Inferno poster 002.jpg | Aliases = Guardians of the Galaxy: Inferno | Directors = James Gunn; David Yarovesky | Producers = James Gunn | ScreenplayWriters = James Gunn | StoryWriters = James Gunn | Musicians = Tyler Bates; James Gunn | Cinematographers = Michael Dallatorre | Editors = James Gunn | Distributors = Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment | Running Time = 3 minutes, 38 seconds | Rating = | Budget = | Release Date = August 6, 2017 | IMDB ID = 7131308 | Quotation = ''Getting down and dirty with a [[procyon lotor]],''
''Got no people skills but he's good with motors.''
''That weird thing by his side's an [[Groot II (Earth-199999)|infantilized sequoia]].''
''The two of them walk by, people say "oh boy-a".''
''They ask me why I'm bringin'''
''A baby into battle.''
''That's really irresponsible''
''And getting them rattled.''
''I say "give me a break,''
''Get off of my back, damn it.''
''[[Peter Quill (Earth-199999)|I]] didn't learn parenting,''
''[[Ego (Earth-199999)|My daddy]] was a planet!"''
''(Zardu Hasselfrau, Zardu Hasselfrau, hey!)''
''(Zardu Hasselfrau, Zardu Hasselfrau, hey!)''
| Speaker = [[Zardu Hasselfrau (Earth-199999)]]{{r|{{ml|Guardians' Inferno}}}} | Appearances = '''Featured Characters:''' * {{1st|[[The Sneepers (Earth-199999)|The Sneepers]]}} ** {{1st|[[Zardu Hasselfrau (Earth-199999)|Zardu Hasselfrau]]}} '''Supporting Characters:''' * {{a|[[Stan Lee (Earth-199999)|Stan Lee]]}} * {{WP|Guillermo Rodriguez (comedian)|Guillermo}} '''Other Characters:''' * {{Mentioned|[[Peter Quill (Earth-199999)|Star-Lord (Peter Quill)]]}} * {{Mentioned|[[Groot II (Earth-199999)|Groot]]}} * {{Mentioned|[[Ego (Earth-199999)|Ego]]}} '''Races and Species:''' * {{1st|[[Sneepers]]}} * {{Mentioned|[[Raccoons|Procyon lotor]]}} * {{Mentioned|[[Flora colossi|Sequoia]]}} * {{Mentioned|[[Celestials]]}} '''Locations:''' * {{a|[[Earth-199999]]}} | Plot = | Cast = * {{WP|David Hasselhoff}} as [[Zardu Hasselfrau (Earth-199999)|Zardu Hasselfrau]] * [[Stan Lee]] as himself * {{WP|Guillermo Rodriguez (comedian)|Guillermo}} as himself * {{WP|Chris Pratt}} as an unnamed [[Robots|robot]] * {{WP|Dave Bautista}}, {{WP|Karen Gillan}}, {{WP|Zoe Saldana}}, {{WP|Michael Rooker}}, [[James Gunn]], {{WP|Sean Gunn}}, and {{WP|Pom Klementieff}} as [[The Sneepers (Earth-199999)|The Sneepers]] | Notes = * Released as a bonus feature on the digital and Blu-ray release for the film {{ml|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2}}. | Trivia = | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Marvel Studios|Marvel Films]] }} [[Category:Short Films]]
